card_description: Enhance Commit: Add the top card of your discard pile to your card pool. This attack gets +2 or -2 damage.
Deadlock First Enhance Commit: Double your Weapon attack's speed and damage.
Enhance: Add 1 asset or Weapon foundation from your discard pile to your card pool or hand.
Enhance Add 1 card from your stage to your card pool: This attack gets +1 speed and +2 damage.
Enhance: If this attack is not blocked, discard your rival's entire momentum.
Enhance Add 1 momentum to your card pool face down: This attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage.
Enhance Add the top card of your deck to your card pool face down: Look at the face down cards in your card pool. You may add 1 of them to your hand.
Response [Once per game]: After your Charge attack deals damage, add all cards from your card pool to your momentum. This ability cannot be canceled.
Enhance: If your Charge or Stun attack is blocked, commit 1 rival foundation.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your ready face down foundations.
Enhance: Ready 2 face down foundations.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, draw 2 cards.
Enhance: End this Enhance Step.
Shigaraki Response: After you block with this card, ready your character.
Combo Enhance: This attack can only be blocked by cards with a printed block modifier of +3 or greater.
Enhance: Actions in your card pool do not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.
Enhance: If this attack has received a speed and damage bonus, it gets +3 damage and gains
Stun: 1.
Enhance Destroy: Add 1 Punch attack from your card pool to your momentum.
Deadlock Enhance: Your Punch attack gets +2 speed and gains Stun: 1.
Enhance Remove: Look at your momentum and turn 1 of them face up.
Response Flip: After a card is added to your momentum, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.
Enhance: Add this card to your hand.
Enhance Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your Fury attack gets +2 speed and +5 damage.
Enhance Discard 1 card: Your Punch attack gets +1 speed and +3 damage.
Response [Once per turn] Commit 1 foundation: After you check a copy of a foundation that is in your stage, build the checked foundation.
Enhance: If this attack is not blocked, commit 1 rival foundation.
Deadlock Enhance: Add 2 rival foundations to the bottom of their deck.
"Throw - If this attack is completely blocked, it deals half damage (rounded up) during the Damage Step."
Enhance [Your attack]: Discard the top 4 cards of your rival's deck. Your attack gets +1 damage for each attack discarded this way.
Response [Once per game]: After your rival plays an attack or action, discard it from their card pool and cancel its effects.
Response: After the Combat Phase begins, reveal your momentum and add 1 [High] or Charge attack revealed this way to your hand.
Response: After an attack is blocked, draw 1 card and discard 1 card. Your next check to play a card gets +1.
Enhance Commit: Your EX or Kick attack gets +2 speed.
Enhance Commit: Your rival's attack gets -2 speed.
Enhance: If this attack deals 5 or more damage, draw 1 card.
"Throw - If this attack is completely blocked, it deals half damage (rounded up) during the Damage Step."
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance [Momentum] Add this card to your card pool: This attack gets +2 or -2 damage.
Response: After this attack is blocked, add it to your momentum after it resolves.
[Fire] Enhance: Discard the top card of your deck: This attack gets -1 speed and +2 damage.
[Water] Enhance: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 1 damage during the Damage Step.
Enhance Destroy: Return this non-Charge attack to its printed damage.
Enhance: This attack gets -1 damage. Your next attack this turn gets +3 damage.
Enhance [Once per turn]: Your next [Low] attack ignores progressive difficulty.
Enhance: If the next attack you play this turn is a Mid attack, it gets +3 speed.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +2 speed and +2 damage.
Deadlock Enhance: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 3 damage.
Response: After your attack is partially blocked, draw 2 cards.
Response [Once per game]: After an attack is completely blocked, your rival reveals their hand.
Choose 1 card in their hand and discard it.
Enhance: Change the zone of your attack.
Enhance [Once per turn]: Your rival adds 1 foundation from their stage to their card pool. If it is your rival's turn, they may build the top card of their deck face down.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Reduce this attack's speed to 0. Draw 1 card.
Enhance Destroy: End this Enhance Step.
Enhance Lose 1 health: Your attack gets +1 speed. If your attack is blocked, your rival loses 1 health and your next attack gets +1 speed. This cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.
Response [Twice per turn]: After your rival loses health, gain 1 health, draw 1 card, and discard 1 card.
MHA02 If there are at least 5 cards in your card pool, this card ignores progressive difficulty.
Enhance: If your attack is not blocked, your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.
Enhance [Your attack] Discard 1 card from your rival's card pool: Your Ranged attack gets +4 damage.
Enhance Flip: If you have 1 or more momentum, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.
Combo Enhance Discard 1 card: Draw 2 cards.
Enhance: If you have played an action this turn, this attack gets +2 speed.
Enhance: This attack gets +2 damage for each card in your momentum.
Deadlock Enhance: Your rival commits 1 foundation for each card in your momentum.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance [Momentum] Remove, discard 1 momentum: Add your rival's attack to their momentum. They may draw 1 card.
Enhance: Switch this attack's speed and damage.
Enhance Commit: This Mid or Kick attack gets +2 speed.
First Enhance Commit: Choose 1 rival foundation. abilities on the chosen card can not be played for the rest of this Enhance Step.
Enhance [Once per turn]: Your EX or Slam attack gets +3 damage.

Response [Once per turn]: After an attack is played, it gets +3 or -3 speed. If it is your attack, each time your rival plays an enhance ability during this attack's Enhance Step, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.
Enhance Destroy 1 foundation: Destroy 1 foundation committed due to this attack's Stun ability. Your rival may lose 2 health to cancel this ability.
Enhance Lose 2 health: Your rival loses 2 health. your rival may destroy 1 foundation to cancel this ability.
Enhance Commit: Your Charge, Fury, or Kick attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
Response [Once per turn]: After a card leaves your stage during the Combat Phase, ready this foundation. Playable while committed.
Form Remove: Draw 1 card.
Response: After your rival plays their 4th foundation this turn, build up to 2 foundations from your hand.
Response Remove: After your rival plays an attack, add it to their hand. Only playable if you have 10 health or less.
Kurogiri Enhance [Once per turn]: Add the top card of your discard pile to the bottom of your deck.
Response Commit: After your rival discards a card during the Combat Phase, draw 1 card.
Enhance Flip: This attack gets -3 speed and +3 damage.
Response Destroy: After your rival plays an enhance ability on an asset or foundation, cancel it.
Deadlock Enhance Destroy: Your rival discards 1 card.
Enhance Flip: Your Punch attack gets +2 speed.
You get +1 hand size for every 3 face down foundations in your stage.
Enhance Flip 1 foundation: Ready 1 face down foundation.
Enhance: Your attack gets +1 damage for every 2 face down foundations in your stage.
Enhance Flip: Look at the top card of your rival's deck.
If you have 10 or less health, this card gets -1 difficulty.

Enhance: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck and add all attacks revealed this way to your hand. Discard the remaining cards and your rival loses 1 health for each card discarded this way. This effect cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.
Enhance Discard the top 4 cards from your deck: If this attack is not blocked, draw 2 cards.
Deadlock Enhance: Discard the top 10 cards of your rival's deck.
Enhance Flip 1 foundation: If your next attack is [High], add the top card of your deck to your momentum. If your next attack is [Mid], your rival flips 1 ready foundation.
When attempting to block with this card, reduce the speed of your rival's attack to 0.
MHA01 First Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Double your attack's speed or damage.
Response Flip: After you lose health due to your rival's attack or effect, gain 3 health.
Enhance [Your turn] Discard the top card of your deck: This attack gets +1 damage.
Endeavor / Todoroki Form Remove: If you have 10 or fewer cards in your deck, draw 2 cards.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Change the zone of your attack.
Enhance: If the zone of your attack has been changed, it gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Add 1 copy of "Meteor Shower" from your discard pile to your momentum.
Enhance [Momentum] Discard 1 card: add this card to your hand.
Response: After you build this card, gain 2 health.
"Build - Add the specified card to your stage."
Enhance Flip: If this is your rival's 3rd or greater attack this Combat Phase, add 1 card from your card pool to your hand.
Response: Before 1 of your foundations would be flipped due to a rival effect, flip this foundation instead.
Enhance Commit: Change the zone of this attack.
Enhance Destroy: Draw 1 card for every 4 Ranged attacks in your discard pile.
First Form Name an attack zone [ [High], [Mid], or [Low]]: Attacks that match the named zone get +2 speed for the rest of this Combat Phase.
Response [Once per turn]: After your rival's attack resolves, reveal 1 random card in their hand. They must play that card as their next form, or discard it.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage.
Response: After you block with this card, both players add the top card of their deck to their card pool face down.
Combo Enhance: This attack gains Stun: 2.
Enhance: Build 1 foundation from your card pool face up.
"Combo (___) - This attacks's Combo Enhance cannot be played unless the card immediately preceding it matches the requirement in parenthesis."

Deadlock Enhance: Destroy 1 rival foundation.
Remove this card from the game.

Response [Once per turn]: After your non-Throw attack deals damage, your rival loses 5 health.

Enhance Discard 2 cards: Draw 2 cards.
Enhance: Add 1 action from your discard pile to your card pool.
Deadlock Enhance: Your rival loses 1 health for each Ally card in your card pool.
"Deadlock - This ability may only played if your rival has more than 10 foundations in their stage."

First Enhance Commit: Unflip 1 committed foundation.
Deadlock Form Remove: Add up to 2 Ranged attacks from your card pool to your hand.
Enhance Discard 2 momentum: This attack gets +10 damage. Only playable if you have dealt damage this Combat Phase.
Enhance: If you have 6 or more Ranged attacks in your discard pile, draw 2 cards.
Enchance Discard the top 3 cards of your deck: This attack gets +2 damage for each Ranged attack discarded this way.
Enhance Destroy 1 foundation: Your Fury attack gets +2 speed and +2 to its Powerful rating.
Response [Once per turn]: After you play a Combo ability, your rival flips 2 ready foundations.
Enhance: Build 1 foundation with a printed difficulty of 0 from your discard pile committed.

Shinso Enhance: Change the zone of this attack. Your next attack gets +2 damage.

Enhance Remove: Change the zone of your rival's attack.
[Order] First Enhance: Both players remove foundations in their stage until they each have 5. End this Enhance Step.
Form [Once per turn]: Add 1 attack or foundation from your discard pile to your hand. Lose health equal to its printed difficulty.
Enhance Commit: This attack gets +2 damage. Your next attack gets +2 damage.
Enhance: Add this card to your hand after it resolves. Only playable if this attack's damage is 15 or greater.
If you have destroyed a foundation this turn, this attack gets -2 difficulty.

At the start of your turn, lose 3 health. This cannot reduce your health below 1.
